attributes.action: An 'Opt Out' scheme for cigarettes & smoking.
attributes.additional_details:
An outright ban on smoking is an unrealistic approach, an 'opt out' scheme is a realistic solution.

Just like an individual can request to be banned from gambling institutions due to an addiction; The same approach can be implemented to quit smoking.

This gives people a choice on if they do decide to give up, to simply request online or in store, to not be sold any tobacco, a national database saves this request and pushes the smoker to quit.
Support will be needed from all tobacco agents to join & share this information. The finer details can be implement if we can gain enough support. I hope.
